values: so..just got home from work..at 11:50...i got an hour of overtime today..this was the worst i've ever seen UPS...it was crazy...but whatever...In other news...i have a bio test tommorow (which i have no clue about)..some homework due for business law..and an essay due in english...yeah..umm..so here's the plan..go to bio..guess on the test....then cut english..and do my business law homework..and then i'm good...so anyway...lots of good shows comin up..if ya wanna go with me...gimme a holla back young...ya dig?
http://blak-b3lt.livejournal.com/3313.html

So..i haven't really updated..just stupid short entries..this is gonna be real though..so anyway..recapping my week...basically...a lot of school and work...i decided i'm gonna become a supervisor at UPS..after all "supervisor" on the resume looks better than "package handler"..School is the usual..go to class..listen..take test..get an a on the test..cause i am that damn good...which reminds me of a story..so the first couple of weeks of class..i wasn't showing up to bio..then i eventually do...and we're doing a lab..and i'm all dressed sexy (cool shades, cool shoes , sweet suit and new tatoos (no tatoos at at all actually))..so we're getting supplies..and this girl standing next to me..leans over..and whispers "i have a huge crush on you"..so i'm like "xcuse me"..and she's like "oh..just talkin to myself"...when she clearly wasn't talking to herself..so as we're walking out of class..she hands me a piece of paper with her number...i don't know if i'm gonna call it tho..we just talk in class...i dont know if i'm interested or not..Then this other girl i met in my business law class - cute girl - and she works at a bmw dealership..the same dealership where i know someone who works there as a salesman..so we had something in common already..we had a pretty decent conversation going..then i'm walking her to her car..and it's a damn "rice racer"...115 hp of raw mean muscle!!!! grrrrr....i dunno..i don't wanna judge people by their car...but it's just the first impression that you get...but whatever..this girl seemed like she was diggin me..so we'll see how it turns out..i dont know what to do bout girls..i'm really focused on other things now...1)transferring 2)work 3)martial arts- we got an amazing team this semester..hopefully we won't get our asses kicked...actualy..i lied..girls are always at the top of my list..i love girls..especially girls that like me..but anyway..fast forward to today....i woke up..went to take my econ test....finished in 35 minutes (we had 3 hours for it) ..got it graded..98 (made a stupid mistake!!)...then went home...watched a movie..worked out..watched a movie..worked out..watched a movie..worked out...so..movies watched today 1)ghostbusters..2)school of rock..3)soul man..4)Mighty Ducks 1 and 2(got the box set..but d3 sucks!)...alrite..that's all for now..more updates as i get more news...and that's the way the cookie crumbles..peace....P.S..i really do like girls...even if i'm not interested in a relationship...just talking is fun...it's good to get a different point of view once in a while..that's all

so...yeah..i'm lazy..this really isn't gonna be a journal entry...just a sign...so that you know im still alive...been really busy with...just random stuff...maybe more details later...peace
http://blak-b3lt.livejournal.com/2610.html

I went to court again today..for my 44 in a 25 and no license plate...and..well..let me tell you a story first..i get there around 8:30ish since court starts at 9..check in..go to the courtroom..and sit...then this really old guy sits down next to me..and by old guy..i mean 78..i know that..cause he told me..he was a really friendly old man...he sat down and he's like..oh my god..i pray to the lord..i need 2 more weeks for this damn house to be torn down...and it was kinda interesting..i think he felt good cause i was listening to him..and then he tells me about how apple cider or cider vinegar is a cure for everything..and magnet therapy..and how the doctors killed his wife..and he needs 3 more weeks to get some paperwork done..and he wants to build a new house..and he has 4 kids..etc...it was interesting..then they called people who pled not guilty..to go talk to the prosecutor..so i wished the guy luck..and left..now..waiting for the prosecutor..i was in the middle of the line..so people were comin out all "no points no points" and with smiles on their faces...i'm like "this is gonna be cake" ..i'm all decked out in a nice suit..very business...as usual..so i go in..he says he'll drop the license plate thing...but he can only reduce the speeding ticket to 2 points...so i try to bargain with him..he says no...but then i said some other stuff..and he's like..i'll talk to the officer go wait in the courtroom...so i'm waiting..and this judge was cool..he was going speeeeedy crazy...so people that were in line after me are comin in and going before me...then the judge takes a break...then he comes back..more new people come in..they go before me again..then the prosecutor comes to the courtroom and talks to me...he's willing to cut it down to unsafe driving..cuz im a good guy..so i told him thanks for understanding...and i told him bout last week..so then he's like "oh..let's just change it to improper traffic flow..cause i don't want you to use up your other unsafe driving"...so yeah..0 poins...fine was like..92 bucks...damn i'm smooth...even though court was 9 am..i called out of work anyway...so i was helping out my dad at the warehouse..then drove the ambulance home.it was fun
http://blak-b3lt.livejournal.com/2462.html

So..back from work..like i said..it sucked...every week we get a new supervisor...since i'm the new guy..and yet the BEST guy..i still get to do the bitch jobs..atleast i confronted the guy about it...UPS sucks...seriously..good thing i'm gone in 2 weeks..i've been lookin around for serious jobs..i got a couple of leads....so today...i gave this girl in one of my classes a ride to her car..and the skatalites were on..and she really enjoyed them..and i told her bout the concert...i dont know if i want to go with her though...She's not really my type anyway..well..whatever...so valentines day is coming up...it's that time of year where guys suck up to their girlfriends hopefully for sexual favors in return...or something to that extent...i'll be going to school that morning..then martial arts club...then going to new brunswick..no valentine tho..maybe i'll keep it that way...maybe i won't...that's all for now..laaaaaaater....P.S. - SKATALITES = greatest band ever
http://blak-b3lt.livejournal.com/2199.html

it's monday...and my mind is pretty much set that i'm gonna quit UPS..seriously..1)i have much more potential ..2)I never cease to amaze myself when a challenge is brought upon me ..3)i look damn good in a suit...UPS = modern slave labor...and honestly..i should be sitting in an office somewhere telling people what to do..So this friday i'm giving them 2 weeks notice... and then i'm off to do something that i'm good at...running my own business..it's funny how i can make $200 a day doing my thing..and barely make that in a week working for UPS...that's all for now..i'll put in another entry at night and bitch about UPS some more..laaaaater
http://blak-b3lt.livejournal.com/1812.html

so..here's the big entry that's gonna cover a couple of days.... but before that...several points...1)I look damn good in a suit...well..that's it basically... THURSDAY-Went to school..yadda yadda...went home and waited for my court appearance at 6:30 pm...i was about to get royally screwed...i was planning all these excuses..i work for ups (not much longer)..im a full time student..etc...but as soon as i went into the prosecutors office...i saw the cop that stopped me..so i did the right thing..i was dressed all real nice...suit and tie...flashed her a smile..said hello...and then..somehow got 2 tickets worth 6 points..reduced to zero points..and just a fine...wow...it's a good thing im a damn smooth talker..and that basically made my night...FRIDAY- so i went to school...had some classes..and wanted to hang out with some people at night...and i really hoped for a short day at work...but..once again..i can never rely on ups to do anything right..so instead of gettin out at a nice 9pm..i got out about 10:45..and was dead tired...so i just went to bed..considering i gotta wake up for my saturday class at 7..so..it's bedtime....SATURDAY- so saturday..i go to Uncle Doug's class...it was fun..but stuff i already know..so sitting throught three hours of repetition kinda sucks...class ends at 11:30..and then i got Martial Arts Club practice at 1..so i got an hour and a half to kill..which sucks..so i go to quick check..get some food..go back..and it's only 11:45...so i wait around..and watch the wrestling matches in the gym..and then at about 12:10..some other people from martial arts come..so we just bullshit till coach shows up....we have practice..good workout..etc...and then i get home...shower...and was invited to do some things...but i needed atleast some rest..so i basically watched NHL all start weekend..and then went to bed..and that's bout it...that's my weekend so far...so..more updates coming soon
